name: Surprise Eggs (itch)
description:
Welcome to Surprise Eggs vending machine for children and toddler.

Real theme vending machine games. Capsule eggs pop like a real ball in vending machine games. Tap to crack open and find hidden objects: candy, chocolate or playable item. Surprise eggs games also provide many kinds of mini games like Catching game, shooting, Driving, Surfing, Find hidden item and much more collection of mini games. 

Play now! Drop a coin in Surprise Eggs vending machine, turn the wheel and watch your surprise eggs drop. Grab your exciting new surprise eggs and rip off the foil and pop it open to reveal a brand new prize. Finally, the item can be played in many mini games available.

You also get your very own collectors album where you can show off to your family and friends. 

Features:
-Touch, tap and swipe your finger to unbox many surprises inside.
-Discover the collected item in the album.
-There are 100 different prizes awaiting. Item like Spiderman lego frozen Elsa etc

If you love watching surprise egg opening videos on youtube, you will love this app!
